hero.subtitle: UB Market LTD connects leading manufacturers with wholesale buyers across Europe. Reliable supply, competitive prices, road transport delivery.

aboutPreview.label: About Us
aboutPreview.title: Your Trusted Partner in Food Export & Import
aboutPreview.p1: UB MARKET LTD is an international trading company specializing in the export and import of food products. We act as a responsible intermediary, connecting leading product manufacturers with wholesale buyers across Europe.
aboutPreview.p2: Our main specialization is international trade in sunflower oil — refined, crude, and high-oleic varieties, available in bottles and bulk tankers.

products.label: Our Products
products.title: What We Supply
products.subtitle: We source high-quality food products directly from reliable manufacturers and deliver them to wholesale buyers across Europe.

sunflower-oil.name: Sunflower Oil
sunflower-oil.description: Refined, deodorized, winterized. PET bottles (0.5–10L) and bulk tank trucks.

frying-oil.name: Frying Oil
frying-oil.description: High-stability oil for professional food service and industrial frying applications.

sugar.name: Beet Sugar
sugar.description: Premium white beet sugar. Available in 25kg, 50kg bags and big bags.

high-oleic.name: High-Oleic Sunflower Oil
high-oleic.description: Refined high-oleic variety — bottled and bulk. Ideal for health-conscious markets.

dairy.name: Dairy Products
dairy.description: Milk, butter, and dairy derivatives from certified European producers.

mayonnaise.name: Mayonnaise & Condiments
mayonnaise.description: Traditional and industrial mayonnaise, sauces, and condiment products.

howWeWork.label: How We Work
howWeWork.title: Simple Process, Reliable Results
howWeWork.subtitle: From first contact to delivery — we handle everything to ensure a smooth trading experience.

steps.title: Contact & Inquiry
steps.text: Tell us what you need — product type, volume, delivery destination. We'll respond within 24 hours.

steps.title: Quote & Agreement
steps.text: We provide competitive pricing, arrange product samples if needed, and finalize the contract terms.

steps.title: Delivery & Support
steps.text: Products are shipped via road transport with full documentation. We ensure on-time delivery and ongoing support.

cta.label: Let's Work Together
cta.title: Ready to Source Quality Food Products?
cta.subtitle: Get a competitive quote for sunflower oil, sugar, dairy, and more. We respond within 24 hours.

footer.copyright: UB Market LTD. All rights reserved.

aboutPage.label: About Us
aboutPage.heroTitle: Your Trusted Partner in European Food Trading
aboutPage.whoP1: UB MARKET LTD is an EU-registered international trading company based in Varna, Bulgaria. We specialize in the export and import of food products, acting as a responsible intermediary between leading manufacturers and wholesale buyers across Europe.
aboutPage.whoP2: Our main specialization is international trade in sunflower oil. We supply a wide range of products — refined, crude, and high-oleic varieties — available in PET bottles (0.5–10 liters) and bulk tank trucks.
aboutPage.whoP3: We source products directly from verified producers and handle everything from pricing negotiation to logistics and documentation, ensuring a smooth and transparent trading experience for every client.

values.title: European Reach
values.text: We deliver across 12+ EU countries, connecting Eastern European producers with Western buyers.

values.title: Trusted Partnerships
values.text: Long-term relationships with verified manufacturers ensure consistent quality and supply.

values.title: Reliable Logistics
values.text: Full road transport coverage across Europe with flexible delivery terms — FOB, CIF, DAP.

values.title: Quality Assured
values.text: All products meet EU food safety standards with full documentation and lab test reports.

aboutPage.rangeSubtitle: We supply a wide range of food products directly from reliable manufacturers across Eastern Europe.
aboutPage.ctaText: Contact us today for competitive pricing and reliable supply.

productsPage.label: Product Catalog
productsPage.heroSubtitle: High-quality food products sourced from verified Eastern European producers for wholesale buyers across the EU.

contactsPage.label: Get in Touch
contactsPage.heroSubtitle: We respond within 24 hours. Reach out for pricing, samples, or partnership inquiries.
